title: My favorite HomeKit power strip is a great gift for 30% off today
content:
Macworld

With less than three weeks to go till Christmas, your big-ticket items are likely already purchased, but if you’re looking for something small for the Apple fan in your life, we’ve got a great gift idea: Amazon is selling the Meross Smart Plug Power Strip for $32.53, a savings of 30 percent and within pennies of the best price we’ve seen.

This power strip has four outlets and four USB ports, each of which can be controlled with Siri and the Home app. It also supports scheduling through Scenes and Automation and also works Alexa and Google Assistant if you haven’t switched over to HomeKit yet. I have several Meross plugs in my home, including this power strip, and I can’t say enough good things about it. Where I’ve had occasional issues with other plugs and power strips, the Meross devices in the house have been rock-solid.

There are few if any HomeKit power strips available so if you know someone who needs one (or just want to build out your own Siri smart home), grab one right now at a fantastic price.
